author: 0x_qz
content: Hi, I've submitted a pr to blob-utils to support devnet-6: https://github.com/Inphi/blob-utils/pull/12, and all credits to <@360491619402776577> 's tx-fuzz code

author: __kasey__
content:
Using either this, or lightly modified tx-fuzz, I get the same error from `BlobToCommitment` `scalar is not canonical when interpreted as a big integer in big-endian`
Does anyone know what the issue is? Here is the fork of tx-fuzz where I resolved some build issues I ran into + added some cli flags: https://github.com/kasey/tx-fuzz/tree/4844
